name: tousle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone's hair untidy, for example by rubbing it, or, of the wind, by blowing it: She tousled her niece's hair, and went out. The wind tousled their hair.
More examplesFewer examplesHe tousled her hair in passing.His hair had been tousled by the wind and stuck up comically to one side.He always had time to tousle a young boy's hair or carry an old lady's shopping for her.
